letters.description: Establish a safe, sacred space and gather initial information about the directee's spiritual journey, current concerns, and desired outcomes.
Explore underlying beliefs, values, and experiences that shape the directee's relationship with the Divine, self, and others. Promote self-awareness.
Help the directee recognize patterns, insights, and spiritual nudges. Facilitate integration of these discoveries into their daily life.
Support the directee in discerning God's presence and will in their life. Empower them to make choices aligned with their spiritual values and calling.
Encourage the directee to embody their spiritual growth through action and cultivate a deepening relationship with the Divine over time.
